entries.meaning: (Britain, Ireland, informal) An informal conversation, usually about everyday matters; a chat, a gossip.

verbs.description: chinwag (third-person singular simple present chinwags, present participle chinwagging, simple past and past participle chinwagged)

entries.meaning: (British, Ireland, informal) To chat, to gossip.
examples: I saw the pair of them chinwagging by the water-cooler.
